column4: I rebuild kernel and enable framebuffer, then I running the kernel with vga=792 option, but I can't see anything in tty1-tty6, why??
I rebuild kernel and enable framebuffer, then I running the kernel with vga=792 option, but I can't see anything in tty1-tty6, why??
custom kernels are not supported here.
if you're going to recompile them... then know what you're doing as you can cause many, serious, unexplainable errors
